tasks.title: T-83 Fuel truck ORCU upgrade
tasks.description: The Fuel truck computer (ORCU board ) is no longer working. The system can not refuel equipment on site. The bypass option is being used. Data is being captured manually for distribution. The Orcu board required an upgrade to the Norcu board. The upgrade has been requested, and the client is waiting for it.

tasks.title: UCC Master card usage
tasks.description: The Master card is used for some additional equipment, but is not registered in the overview of the  FuelOnet platform. On the SiteOmat, the vehicle information can be extracted. A ticket has been raised for the GVR team to follow up with this.

tasks.title: Apoera internet connection issue
tasks.description:
The station went offline. After a cold reset of the system, the internet connection was restored.
Data is uploading normally again.

tasks.title: FuelOnet Sync (Baitali station & Fuel truck
tasks.description: Requested the additional information to start the sync process. Meetings have been requested to start after the FuelOnet issue has been resolved.

tasks.title: Henar Islander pump deactivation
tasks.description: The Converter board was checked, parameters were changed. After troubleshooting, the Converter cable was replaced with a new one on location.
